de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.system

Interface HardwarePlatform

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cubieboard3, RaspberryPi3

    public interface HardwarePlatform
extends Runnable
    Defines functions which are dependant on the board hardware or low level configuration of the operating system.
    Author:
    Daniel Pyka

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectToMobileInternet()
      Use some driver to start a daemon process which handles mobile internet connection.
      void evaluateSignalQuality()
      Use various parameters to determine, if the surf stick is able to upload the heart rate data power efficient.
      Hcitool getHcitool()
      Get the hcitool command line tool.
      int getOverallRSSIfromMobileInternet()
      Get the rssi value from the surf stick.
      SignalQualityBean getSignalQualityBean()
      Get the last bean with signal quality parameters.
      boolean isConnectedToMobileInternet()
      Check if the Sensorplatform is connected to mobile internet via a surf stick.
      boolean isUploadPermitted()
      Return the value of the internal upload permission flag.
      void setLEDstateERROR()
      Turn off a LED on the board.
      void setLEDstateRECORDING()
      Set a LED on the board to blink in a "Heartbeat" pattern.
      void setLEDstateSTANDBY()
      Set a LED on the board to blink slowly.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

    • Method Detail

      • isConnectedToMobileInternet

        boolean isConnectedToMobileInternet()
        Check if the Sensorplatform is connected to mobile internet via a surf stick.
        Returns:
        true if connection is active, false otherwise

      • getOverallRSSIfromMobileInternet

        int getOverallRSSIfromMobileInternet()
        Get the rssi value from the surf stick.
        Returns:
        int signal strength rssi in dBm

      • getSignalQualityBean

        SignalQualityBean getSignalQualityBean()
        Get the last bean with signal quality parameters.
        Returns:
        SignalQualityBean bean

      • evaluateSignalQuality

        void evaluateSignalQuality()
        Use various parameters to determine, if the surf stick is able to upload the heart rate data power efficient. This method is intended to set an internal upload permission flag in the concrete implementation of hardware platform.

      • isUploadPermitted

        boolean isUploadPermitted()
        Return the value of the internal upload permission flag.
        Returns:
        true in case of good mobile internet signal quality, false otherwise

      • connectToMobileInternet

        void connectToMobileInternet()
        Use some driver to start a daemon process which handles mobile internet connection.

      • setLEDstateSTANDBY

        void setLEDstateSTANDBY()
        Set a LED on the board to blink slowly.

      • setLEDstateRECORDING

        void setLEDstateRECORDING()
        Set a LED on the board to blink in a "Heartbeat" pattern.

      • setLEDstateERROR

        void setLEDstateERROR()
        Turn off a LED on the board.

      • getHcitool

        Hcitool getHcitool()
        Get the hcitool command line tool.
        Returns:
        Hcitool object for interacting with hcitool console tool
